items.sentence: Tom should be able to tell us a little about Boston.
I don\'t think Tom would ever let me read his diary.
Tom has always wanted to be a professional musician.
Tom might arrive a couple of hours before Mary does.
Tom and Mary\'s wedding anniversary is October 20th.
Tom opened the door, even though I asked him not to.
Tom\'s father doesn\'t allow him to go out at night.
Didn\'t you know that Tom used to work in Australia?
Tom doesn\'t have what it takes to be a good leader.
Tom doesn\'t know for certain when Mary will arrive.
